profile.name: Achmad Fathullah
profile.title: Software Engineer, Android Developer
profile.address: Zaenal Zakse No.46 Street RT.004 RW.001 Kel. Jodipan, Kec. Blimbing Malang, Jawa Timur, 65137
profile.bio: I'm Achmad that's born in June 09, 1996. A software engineer who has high enthusiasm with new technology especially on Mobile Application Development. Skilled in Java/Kotlin Android Development. Spirit of self improvisation is high, puts forward analytical thinking and Strong engineering professional graduated from UIN Maliki Malang.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Bug Fixing on Mobile Apps, Building and maintaining mobile apps, Interconnect with server, and complete the work in accordance with the deadline

1. Building and maintaining API for mobile banking Apps Bank Mandiri Taspen
2. Building and maintaining Backoffice web for Mobile Banking Apps
3. Building and maintaining mobile banking Apps Bank Mandiri Taspen
4. Develop new Feature Deposito according to existing business needs and collaborate with other engineers

experience.title: Freelance Software Developer

projects.title: Sitamoto Mobile Apps
projects.description: Kelola perangkat IoT kamu cukup dengan sentuhan tombol atau menggunakan suara, kami memberikan pendekatan yang mudah dan praktis namun detail untuk kebutuhan pemakaian perangkat IoT sehari-hari

projects.title: Ceklok Mobile Apps
projects.description: CEKLOK merupakan platform HRIS yang ikut berkembang dengan perusahaan. Features: Authentication with AI face Recognition, Absence & Leave, Overtime, etc

projects.title: Commjunction Mobile Apps
projects.description: COMMJUNCTION memberikan platform komunitas yang dapat dipersonalisasikan dengan kebutuhan sebuah komunitas untuk mencapai tujuan bersama

projects.title: Bank Mandiri Taspen Backoffice
projects.description: Web app page for Mobile Banking to record and manage all transaction on Mobile Banking Mandiri Taspen. Backoffice merupakan aplikasi berbasis web yang berfungsi untuk mencatat aktifitas yang dilakukan mobile banking, pengelola user mobile banking (Lupa password, Pendaftaran User baru, Block user, etc), Pencatat log error dan transaksi, Pembukaan deposito special rate dan lain lain.

projects.title: Sistem Informasi Beasiswa UIN Malang
projects.description: Sistem Informasi Beasiswa (SIBEA) merupakan sistem manajemen penerimaan dan pendaftaran beasiswa lingkup Universitas Islam Negeri Maulana Malik Ibrahim Malang

projects.title: Sistem Informasi Reminder UIN Malang
projects.description: Reminder information systems (management system for foreign students who will continue their studies at the university or who will take time off, manage their personal data then give warnings / reminders to e-mails of foreign students when there is important information that must be immediately followed up)

projects.title: Popular Movies App
projects.description: This is my version of Udacity's Popular Movie project. In this project implementing The Movie DB API of popular movies, top rated movies, movie's trailers and reviews. It also has endless scroll on movies list. It is also implementing Model View Presenter (MVP) architecture. I build this as part of Udacity Associate Android Developer Fast Track program.
